participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, with a penchant for artistic pursuits.
participant_1.background: I can draw. I have sausage fingers. I'm bloated. I like sprite soda.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Passionate about music and enjoys a good scare from horror films.
participant_2.background: I want to be a music teacher. I play the violin. I enjoy watching horror flicks. My favorite color is red orange.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello there!
What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy playing the violin, watching horror flicks, and working on my music teacher education.
That's cool! I can draw, and I like to drink Sprite soda.
I've never tried Sprite soda before. Is it good?
It's my favorite soda! It's really refreshing.
I'll have to try it sometime. What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play classical music, but I also like to play pop music.
I love classical music! What's your favorite piece?
My favorite piece is "Moonlight Sonata."
That's a great piece! I love the second movement.
Me too! What kind of horror flicks do you like to watch?
I like all kinds of horror flicks, but I especially like slasher movies and psychological thrillers.
I love slasher movies too! What's your favorite slasher movie?
My favorite slasher movie is "Friday the 13th."
That's a classic! I love the first one.
Me too! It's so good.
I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
